description.para: The value of this attribute and any other that derived classes might declare must be set during calculation.

briefdescription.para: returns the net present value of the instrument.
returns the error estimate on the NPV when available.
returns the date the net present value refers to.
returns any additional result returned by the pricing engine.
returns all additional result returned by the pricing engine.
returns whether the instrument might have value greater than zero.
set the pricing engine to be used.

simplesect.para: calling this method will have no effects in case the performCalculation method was overridden in a derived class.

detaileddescription.para: When a derived argument structure is defined for an instrument, this method should be overridden to fill it. This is mandatory in case a pricing engine is used.
When a derived result structure is defined for an instrument, this method should be overridden to read from it. This is mandatory in case a pricing engine is used.
This method performs all needed calculations by calling the performCalculations method.

simplesect.para: Objects cache the results of the previous calculation. Such results will be returned upon later invocations of calculate. When the results depend on arguments which could change between invocations, the lazy object must register itself as observer of such objects for the calculations to be performed again when they change.
Should this method be redefined in derived classes, LazyObject::calculate() should be called in the overriding method.

detaileddescription.para: This method must leave the instrument in a consistent state when the expiration condition is met.

In case a pricing engine is not used, this method must be overridden to perform the actual calculations and set any needed results. In case a pricing engine is used, the default implementation can be used.
This class is purely abstract and defines the interface of concrete instruments which will be derived from this one.

xrefdescription.para: observability of class instances is checked.
